definition: to hire/to rent/to charter/to rent out/to lease out/rent/land tax
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]

sentences.english: The pittance your father used to pay me as rent won't even keep me in tea.
sentences.chinese: 當年你爸爸給我的那點租錢，還不夠我喝茶用的呢。

sentences.english: He is too poor to pay the rent right now, let alone the cash pledge.
sentences.chinese: 他現在窮得連租錢都不能付了，更不用說押金了。
